Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Forest Park and UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and UIC/Halsted due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and UIC/Halsted due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and UIC/Halsted at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
